original_text: For thou hast broken the yoke of his burden, and the staff of his shoulder, the rod of his oppressor, as in the day of Midian.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 무겁게 멘 멍에와 그들의 어깨의 채찍과 그 압제자의 막대기를 주께서 꺾으시되 미디안의 날과 같이 하셨음이니이다

sentences.original_text: For thou hast broken the yoke of his burden
and the staff of his shoulder
as in the day of Midian
